name: Snappy Compressed File
summary: Learn about .SNAPPY files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: SNAPPY files may have a lower compression ratio than other compression programs, meaning that the files compressed by Snappy are larger in size than those created by other programs. However, the goal of Snappy is to be a fast compressor, not to achieve maximum compression. Therefore, while compressed files may be larger, they are compressed much more quickly.
NOTE: Snappy is distributed as a source code library written in C++.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
